#Reproducible Research: Peer Assessment 1#

=============================================================================================================
Load the libraries
```{r libraries, echo=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

Load, read and transform the data
```{r readingdata, echo=TRUE}
setwd("//cib.net/shareparis/Home13/silvaol/PRIVE/COURSERA/Data Science R/Reproducible Research")
activity=read.csv("activity.csv")
activity$date <- as.POSIXlt(activity$date)
```

**What is mean total number of steps taken per day?**

1. Calculate the total number of steps taken per day

```{r steps, echo=TRUE}
stepsbyday <- group_by(activity,date)
summarize(stepsbyday,mean(steps,na.rm = TRUE))
```

2. Make a histogram of the total number of steps taken each day
```{r hist, echo=TRUE}
hist <- ggplot(data=stepsbyday) + geom_histogram()
print(hist)
